EN.FRONT_ID: Place the front of your NRIC inside the box
EN.BACK_ID: Place the back of your NRIC inside the box
EN.RECORDING:
Recording...
Please hold the camera steady.
EN.MOVE_FACE_UP: Please move your face slightly up.
EN.MOVE_FACE_DOWN: Please move your face slightly down.
EN.MOVE_FACE_LEFT: Please move your face slightly left.
EN.MOVE_FACE_RIGHT: Please move your face slightly right.
EN.MOVE_FACE_CLOSE: Please move your face slightly closer.
EN.MOVE_FACE_AWAY: Please move your face slightly away.
EN.FACE_IN_FRAME: Please place your face in the frame.

BM.FRONT_ID:
Letakkan bahagian hadapan 
MyKad anda dalam kotak
BM.BACK_ID:
Letakkan bahagian belakang 
MyKad anda dalam kotak
BM.RECORDING:
Merakam...
Sila pegang telefon dengan stabil.
BM.MOVE_FACE_UP:
Sila gerakkan muka anda 
sedikit ke atas.
BM.MOVE_FACE_DOWN:
Sila gerakkan muka anda 
sedikit ke bawah.
BM.MOVE_FACE_LEFT:
Sila gerakkan muka anda 
sedikit ke kiri.
BM.MOVE_FACE_RIGHT:
Sila gerakkan muka anda 
sedikit ke kanan.
BM.MOVE_FACE_CLOSE: Sila rapatkan wajah anda ke kamera.
BM.MOVE_FACE_AWAY: Sila jauhkan wajah anda dari kamera.
BM.FACE_IN_FRAME: Sila letakkan muka anda dalam bingkai.
